ingredients.ingredient: 1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix

cookingTips: Crush cookies into varied sizes for texture contrast between 'mud' layers
Prepare pudding exactly according to package directions for proper consistency
Layer pudding and crushed cookies alternately, finishing with pudding topped with gummy worms
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you create appealing layers of texture and color in this simple no-bake dessert?
